p: The crystal structure of Î±-glucosidase (PDB ID: 4J5T), DPP (IV) complex enzyme (PDB ID: 2P8S) and insulin receptor (IR) (PDB ID: 1IR3) was retrieved from Protein Data Bank ( http://www.rcsb.org/pdb). These molecules were downloaded in Protein Data Bank (PDB) format and the water molecules, as well as other heteroatoms, were omitted from the complex protein molecule.
